channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Has Something He’d Like to Sell You
item.description: The former president’s history of merchandising himself may be broadly revealing in unexpected ways.

item.title: Middle East Crisis Updates: Israel Targets Hezbollah Official in Strike in Damascus

item.title: Russia Pushes Forward in Ukraine’s East After Fall of Vuhledar
item.description: Russian troops have now entered Toretsk, a strategic hilltop city, and are pressing with assaults elsewhere in the Donetsk region.

item.title: Nobel Prize in Chemistry Is Awarded to 3 Scientists for Work With Proteins
item.description: The award is the third 2024 sciences Nobel to be announced this week.

item.title: China reportedly offered to sell EVs for a minimum of €30,000 in Europe, half the average price of EVs in the region
item.description: China's reported offer fell way below the average €66,000 price for an EV in Europe.

item.title: Iranian Official Heads to Saudi Arabia as Israel Postpones U.S. Meeting
item.description: The Biden administration is dealing with complex dynamics in the Middle East as it tries to keep conflicts involving Israel from escalating further.

item.title: Shein’s U.K. sales hit $2 billion ahead of possible London listing
item.description: Shein’s U.K. sales soared to £1.55 billion.

item.title: The price of your cheeseburger is being threatened by Big Meat, alleges McDonald’s
item.description: McDonald’s accuses all the major meat processing giants of colluding to choke the beef supply and drive up prices
